Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 13 for SLE 12 SP3)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 13 for SLE 12 SP3)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.132-94_33 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2018-14734: drivers/infiniband/core/ucma.c allowed ucma_leave_multicast to access a certain data structure after a cleanup step in ucma_process_join, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) (bsc#1131390).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: drivers/infiniband/core/ucma.c in the Linux kernel through 4.17.11 allows ucma_leave_multicast to access a certain data structure after a cleanup step in ucma_process_join, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free).
